entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding a trimming Feature Switch for Http3Support #77420
  • Assert running System.Net.Sockets tests on macOS 13 #77416
  • Convert DllImport to LibraryImport takes a long time when processing many DllImports #77415
    8.0.0
  • SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws fails in macOS 13 #77414
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a code generator to handle option validation #77412
    8.0.0
  • Improve XunitWrapper test runner #77410
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegex auto-correct causes CS0756 multiple defining declarations #77409
    8.0.0
  • DynamicRevocationTests fails on macOS 13 #77408
  • NativeAOT symbols are broken on linux when publishing Release #77407
    7.0.x
  • ExtendedProtectionPolicy constructor throws unnecessarily on WASM #77405
  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to create quality ValidateOptionsResult instances #77404
    8.0.0
  • CI build failure: mono llvmfullaot linux x64 - No output #77403
  • [API Proposal]: Expand data validation attributes #77402
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Question about COMDAT and exception handling #77396
  • .Net 6/Win11 HttpClient HandshakeFailure TLS issue #77393
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 8 #77391
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions work planned for .NET 8 #77390
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` - `System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory.` #77387
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 8] Mono workload doesn't import Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task #77385
    8.0.0
  • UseWindowsService reports a gracefull ServiceStop to SCM even in case of exception, so it's impossible to schedule a restart #77381
  • Entire indirect stores denormalize normalize-on-store locals #77379
    Future
  • Cms signature created with .Net Framework cannot be verified with .Net Core for an elliptic curve certificate #77377
  • Clarification about hdt_load_in_memory_assembly #77375
  • Set-AzKeyVaultSecret Socket Exception and timeout #77374
  • Buffered file stream doesn't flush data right #77373
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationErrorsException: Section or group name 'system.diagnostics' is already defined. #77369
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe is not obey .NET Standard 2.0 (it should support .NET Core 2.1 App) #77367
  • Restore failure due to `The process cannot access the file x because it is being used by another process` #77364
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\Exceptions\\general_class_instance01\\general_class_instance01.cmd #77363
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [Linux] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols is not supported on this platform #77022
  • PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority> edge case Count out of sync #77212
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Perf_String, Perf_Stringbuilder, other on 8/9/2022 #77064
  • VN based copy prop assertion when enabling debug #77380
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\StructABI\\StructABI.cmd #77362
  • [API Proposal]: Add http request/response correlation id to LoggingHttpMessageHandler (Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Logging) #76998
    Future
  • UTC Conversion of DateTime.MinValue for UTC-xy timezones return different results #77376
  • Assertion failure 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) in System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests #72830
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnly empty collection singletons #76028
    8.0.0
  • ObjWriter duplicates sections in COFF output #77257

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding Readme.md for DirectoryServices.Protocols and Regex libraries #77418
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • README for extensions libraries #77413
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77411
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77406
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add README docs for XML libraries #77401
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Remove custom Utf8 encoder implementation #77400
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Slightly improve string unrolling for length 5 and 6 #77398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Use u8 in Utf8Formatter date formatting #77395
  • Consolidate the `GUID` to string logic #77394
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [FileStream] Flush(flushToDisk: true) should always flush to disk #77384
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [MONO][Marshal] Fix race condition in marshal callback installation #77383
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77382
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 7.0.x
  • [WIP] Issue 47202 #77370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger][documenatation] Debugging library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • SPMI: More information on CI failures #77361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reported PriorityQueue issue. #77229
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Detriplicate internal SingleProducerSingleConsumerQueue #76932
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix copy propagation dump #77389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update def flags in `gtCloneExpr` #77378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix comment #77226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77360
    area-System.Console
  • SPMI: Fix repPrintObjectDescription and repGetStringLiteral #77372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Temporary instrumentation for #76280 #77365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Enable multi-reg `LONG` nodes on 32 bit #76263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make Type.IsEnum an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix documentation for INumberBase IsComplex and IsImaginary #77330
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve total L2 size calculation logic on osx-arm64 #75881
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable emitting Vector64 SIMD intrinsics on Amd64 #77320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Lazily instantiate JsonSerializerOptions.Converters #77219
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Simplify type info resolver assignment #76275
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Removing empty variable live ranges when possible #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Move usages of `COMPlus_` var to `DOTNET_` fallback #77239
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold static readonly struct X = <zero> to a jit-time const, e.g. Guid.Empty #77354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
